name: Biostar Yellow
description: Biostar Yellow is a new generation of vegetable inks, characterized by their very good performance, high gloss, very good dot clipping and very fast fixing with excellent friction resistance. It is a very safe and flexible range that can be used on the most common supports in offset: coated gloss, matte, high gloss, cardboard, cardboard... Being free of mineral oils, they do not contain VOCs (volatile organic compounds) and therefore they are very suitable for printing the outside of food packaging, toy wrappers, cosmetics and office supplies.
